text: The European Roller Hockey Championship is a European roller hockey competition organised by World Skate Europe - Rink Hockey and contested by the best men's national teams. Spain are the current champions, after defeating Portugal 6–3 in the 2018 final to win their 17th title. The most successful team is Portugal, who have won the competition 21 times. == Results == === Tournaments === {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center;" |- !Year !Host city !Winner !Score
